Description: Painted limestone shabti of Rya with a black wig, a carved face, crossed hands in relief holding the black incised hoes, the legs inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in five rows of incised Hieroglyphs at the front and with a single column of black incised Hieroglyphs at the back, the back of one arm is decorated with a black incised representation of a seed-basket.
